instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2850: What is 820-2850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U5000: What is U5000? This is the System Management Controller(SMC) in macbooks from 2013-2015.

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message:
Hi,
2010 2.66 i7 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
MacBook Pro that I replaced the Tandan Cap now Video works fine.
When I plug power into MagSafe Machine starts up.
Keyboard works letters work and trackpad works.
If I push the power button on keyboard machine instantly shutdown. I try to start by pushing power button and nothing happens.
I tried another keyboard and no difference.
Disconnected everything same issue.
?

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message: Does the charge light turn green when you press the power button ? Basically is it doing a smc reset ?

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message: Yes charge light turn green when you press the power button

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message:
Any corrosion on keyboard connector ?

Whats <CHIP>U5000</CHIP> area like ? Any components knocked off or out of spec ?

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message: Issue will be around <CHIP>U5001</CHIP> or <CHIP>U5703</CHIP>, probably corrosion.

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message:
Thanks Duke!
<CHIP>U5703</CHIP> has a burned through pin due to a liquid spill.
Duke is there a dictionary that explains the language for schematics?

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message: You can remove <CHIP>U5703</CHIP>. Just no way to reset the SMC anymore. Not really a huge deal.

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message: No dictionary, only guessing based on context f the circuit and reading the datasheets when and if they are available. Which signal are you interested in?

threads.title: 2010 MacBook Pro won't start when power button is pushed.
threads.message:
Hi Louis,
Nothing particular at the moment just want to become more self sufficient quicker is all.
Thanks for responding ill be back prob in the next day or so with a question! lol
Louis Thank You for offering this forum. Invaluable to many of us!
